meanings.definition: A person who defers or postpones something.
meanings.sent1: The deferrer decided to put off the meeting until next week.
meanings.sent2: The deferrer always procrastinates when it comes to making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The deferrer joked that they were the champion of delaying tasks.
meanings.sent4: Being a deferrer is like being a professional time traveler, always pushing things to the future.
meanings.sent5: The deferrer's motto is 'Why do today what you can put off until tomorrow?'

meanings.sent4: His habit of deferring tasks often leads to unnecessary stress and chaos.
meanings.sent5: If you deferrer dealing with problems, they may become even more challenging to solve later on.
